isis.stitle: TSI 05-09-02R - On Certain 7000 HPV Models the Passenger Side Splash Panel may Rub the Underside of the Hood

subjectgroup.subject: On Certain 7000 HPV Models the Passenger Side Splash Panel may Rub the Underside of the Hood

geninfo.para: On certain 7000 HPV models the passenger side splash panel may rub the underside of the hood, which can result in excessive wear to the underside of the hood. If this is occurring, the splash panel must be trimmed following the Steps in the Service Procedure.

warning.para: To avoid property damage, personal injury, or death, park the vehicle on a flat level surface, set the parking brake, turn the engine off, and chock the wheels.

step1.para: Release the passenger side splash panel mounting clips, Figure 1, Item 4, by pulling the clip away from the splash panel and remove the splash panel. Refer to Service Manual S09007 on ISIS or in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for detailed information if needed.
Carefully remove, with a suitable cutting tool, the shaded area on the splash panel shown in Figure 1, Item 2, along the transition line shown in Figure 1, Item 1 and Figure 2.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. Remove Dark Shaded Area Along Transition Line
2. Dark Shaded Area to be Removed
3. Do Not Remove Beyond this Point
